item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND!"

FRIDAY, MARCH 19, at the Dedham Hilton Hotel Grand Ballroom, 25 Allied Drive, Dedham. (781)329-7900.
Exit 14, East St., off Rte. 128/95.
www.se-4u.com
Free door prizes, and dance music by award-winning DJ, 8:30-12 AM.
Free MERENGUE dance lessons 7:30-8:30.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES 35-60 y.o.
Suitable for all singles and couples.
Admission is only $12.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club and The Single CEO’s Club www.singleceos.com .
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE
